name: Bitcoin Tycoon - Mining Simulation Game
detailed_description:
Introduction

In Bitcoin Tycoon - mining simulation game, you play as a new person who just get touched with the Virtual Currency in early 2014. Follow the protagonist, learn knowledge from elders, understand the bitterness behind mining, as well as the story between them. Overwhelmed mining industry, expand your business, you will eventually leave your own name in history.



  • D.I.Y DEVICES
Free select from dozens of brands and tons hardwares, setup your dream PC/Miner. Different motherboards may contain different mount and type of slots.


  • STORYLINE
Contact with 8 mainly person, everyone has their own circle and life. Why Mr Huang introduce the protagonist into the mining world, What does the Boss Wang planning for, what is the conflict between protagonist and his/her mother, player need to handle all of these issues one by one.

  • LIFESTYLE
Choose the way you like to play. Whether to becoming a big mine owner, becoming a mega currency trader, or even decadent at home, no one will judge you.

  • INTERIOR DESIGN
Decoration and upgrade your house, your life will become better and better.

  • RANDOM EVENTS
What happens tomorrow? You never know the ending of BITCOIN TYCOON.

  • FUTURE
What to do after making enough money? Perhaps this will be your player as a worry. Set up a mining pool, join the hardware research and development, build a new coin exchange, set up a cloud mining farm or even more, mining is only the beginning, definitely not the end.

  • MODS
Bitcoin tycoon will probably support Steam workshop and Mod after EA release.

supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win7
  • Processor: I3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX750
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX960
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel iris
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.12.6
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
